author: Amazon Customer

review: I wish that more shows were free with amazon prime. It feels like as an amazon prime member you should get WAY more for the money than what we get. But the fire stick is super cool. But just as an add on. I wouldn't count on it as your only TV viewing. I do like that you can use other apps on it and connect it to netflix and play games. Overall we have really enjoyed it.
author: mama ness
